name: WHO?
description:
A short game made for the 51st Tri jam.

In this game jam we were challenged to make a game in 3 hours following the theme of: Who is the enemy.

In WHO? you are challenged to find the enemy of each level within the given time. With each level adding more NPC's to make it harder to spot the enemy.

Controls:

W - Move up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right

Left Mouse Click -  Select enemy
